title: Default Login Credentials on https://broadbandmaps.mtn.com.gh/
content:
Summary:
<image_0>
Supporting Material:
Impact
Access admin Panel due to Default credentials
steps: Attempt to log in using default credentials (e.g., admin/admin or similar commonly used defaults)
vuln_description: The website https://broadbandmaps.mtn.com.gh/ uses default login credentials, allowing unauthorized access to the admin panel. This is a common security misconfiguration where default or weak credentials are not changed after deployment.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it involves checking for default credentials, a common and well-documented practice in security testing. There are no complex interactions or states involved.

authnz_metadata.reasoning: The report involves default credentials allowing access to the admin panel. The methodologies described focus on testing authorization boundaries by swapping user sessions or resource IDs during actions. Default credentials are a static misconfiguration and not tied to dynamic session/resource testing. The detection methods (e.g., swapping sessions, testing unauthenticated access) would not inherently uncover pre-configured credentials unless explicitly part of the 'action' or 'resource_id' substitution process, which is not described here.
